name: @nervusdb/core
description: NervusDB v1.1 - 高性能神经知识图谱数据库，支持流式查询、类型安全、属性索引与变长路径

scripts.test:coverage: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('coverage/.tmp', { recursive: true })" && VITEST_COVERAGE=1 vitest run --coverage --exclude 'tests/**/*performance*.test.ts'
scripts.ci: pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint && pnpm test:coverage && pnpm coverage:check-per-file && pnpm build && pnpm bench:baseline
scripts.test:ci-seq: VITEST_COVERAGE=1 vitest run --coverage --reporter=dot --exclude 'tests/**/*performance*.test.ts' tests/unit && VITEST_COVERAGE=1 vitest run --coverage --reporter=dot --exclude 'tests/**/*performance*.test.ts' tests/integration && VITEST_COVERAGE=1 vitest run --coverage --reporter=dot --exclude 'tests/**/*performance*.test.ts' tests/system
scripts.test:ci-seq-no-cov: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' pnpm exec vitest run --reporter=dot --exclude 'tests/**/*performance*.test.ts' tests/unit/storage && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' pnpm exec vitest run --reporter=dot --exclude 'tests/**/*performance*.test.ts' tests/unit/query && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' pnpm exec vitest run --reporter=dot --exclude 'tests/**/*performance*.test.ts' tests/unit/graph && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' pnpm exec vitest run --reporter=dot --exclude 'tests/**/*performance*.test.ts' tests/unit/connection && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' pnpm exec vitest run --reporter=dot --exclude 'tests/**/*performance*.test.ts' tests/integration && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' pnpm exec vitest run --reporter=dot --exclude 'tests/**/*performance*.test.ts' tests/system
scripts.ci:prepush: pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint:core && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' pnpm test:ci-seq-no-cov && pnpm build
